name: Carni-Forest
description:
This game was created for GBJAM 10.

Carni-Forest is a turn-based, strategy RPG with puzzle blocks!

Controls:

  • W - Up
  • A - Left
  • S- Down
  • D - Right
  • SPACE - A (Confirm)
  • SHIFT - B (Back)
  • E - Select (Rotate)

Special thank you to Madalyn Curts and Henry Cooksey
